text: Boundary County is a county in the U.S. state of Idaho. As of the 2020 census, 12,056 people lived there. The county seat and largest city is Bonners Ferry. == Communities == === Cities === * Bonners Ferry * Moyie Springs === Unincorporated communities === * Copeland * Eastport * Good Grief * Naples * Porthill * Curley Creek == References == Category:Idaho counties Category:1915 establishments in Idaho
title: Boundary County, Idaho
